name: Automation survey Pump 1
read attribut pump 1
func:

return msg;

name: actions to realize
Read id of topic
func:
msg.topic="SELECT IdTopics FROM topics WHERE PATH= '"+msg.path+"'";
return msg

name: add topic if not exist
write topic value
func:
msg.topic = "INSERT INTO data SET idtopics= " + msg.payload[0].IdTopics+" , value = "+msg.value;
return msg

name: fix path
func:
msg.path = "/stm32wb5mmg/"+msg.path;
return msg;
